title: A Night of Peat and Passion: The Laphroaig Masterclass at Club Mareva Beirut

content.raw:
On February 27, 2025, Club Mareva Beirut had the pleasure of hosting an exclusive Laphroaig Single Malt Whisky Masterclass, an evening dedicated to the bold and unmistakable character of this legendary Islay whisky. Led by master of spirits Elie Abi Khalil, the event brought together whisky connoisseurs and enthusiasts for a deep dive into the world of peated single malts.

An Immersive Whisky Experience

From the moment guests arrived, the atmosphere was electric. With every dram poured, Elie Abi Khalil guided attendees through the rich history, unique distillation process, and unmistakable flavor profiles that make Laphroaig a whisky like no other. From the signature smoky, medicinal, and maritime notes to the deep complexity of aged expressions, each sip was an experience of its own.

A Packed House, A Memorable Evening

The event was fully booked, with Club Mareva Beirut's intimate setting providing the perfect ambiance for an immersive tasting experience. Conversations flowed as guests exchanged thoughts on their favorite expressions, discovering new layers of flavor with every pour.

Adding to the eveningâ€™s exclusivity, each attendee left with a special bottle of Laphroaig Quarter Cask, a token of appreciation and a perfect way to continue their whisky journey at home.

A Testament to Club Mareva Beirutâ€™s Whisky Culture

This masterclass was not just a tastingâ€”it was a celebration of craftsmanship, heritage, and the camaraderie that great whisky inspires. At Club Mareva Beirut, we take pride in curating unforgettable experiences, bringing together cigar aficionados and whisky lovers to explore the finest pairings and rarest spirits.

A Special Thanks to Vincenti

We would like to extend our sincere gratitude to Vincenti, the official importer of Laphroaig to Lebanon, for their unwavering support and dedication to the whisky community. Their passion for premium spirits and commitment to excellence made this event possible, and we look forward to future collaborations that continue to elevate the whisky experience in Lebanon.

Stay tuned for more exclusive masterclasses and tasting events, as we continue to bring the best of the whisky world to Lebanonâ€™s premier cigar lounge.

Cheers to another night to remember! ðŸ¥ƒ
